trans-unit.source: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma lista de palavras ou frases alternativas, que podem ser usadas para corresponder à entrada de fala.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto contém uma lista de alternativas palavras ou frases, qualquer um dos quais pode ser reconhecido quando faladas.

trans-unit.source: You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects or arrays of <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar uma lista de alternativas de matrizes de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos ou matrizes de <xref:System.String> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A> property to access the alternative items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A> propriedade para acessar os itens alternativos na lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> classe representa o `one-of` elemento a partir do World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o SRGS `one-of` elemento e detalhes sobre o suporte por Speech, consulte [um-do elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" />.

trans-unit.source: You can construct an instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> class from an array of <xref:System.String> objects, from an array of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects, or as an empty list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode construir uma instância do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> classe a partir de uma matriz de <xref:System.String> objetos de uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos, ou como uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects instead of <xref:System.String> objects in a list of alternatives lets you apply properties of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> to each item in the list, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Usando <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos em vez de <xref:System.String> objetos em uma lista de alternativas lhe permite aplicar propriedades de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> para cada item na lista, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> element to build lists of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> elements containing country names, any one of which may be used to recognize the containing phrase.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> elemento para criar listas de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> elementos que contém nomes de país, qualquer um deles pode ser usado para reconhecer o contendo frase.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds one of the resulting <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objects to their respective rules for European countries and South American countries.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona um dos resultante <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objetos seus respectivos regras para países europeus e América do Sul países.

trans-unit.source: Further on, the example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object to group rule references to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica` into a list of two alternatives, either one of which may be used to recognize spoken input.
trans-unit.target: Adicional, o exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto ao grupo de referências de regra a `ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica` em uma lista de duas alternativas, um dos quais pode ser usada para reconhecer a entrada de fala.

trans-unit.source: The alternative items to add.
trans-unit.target: Os itens alternativos a serem adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> class from an array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> de uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática que reconhece a frase "é de um país que ganhou o Cup World" seguido do nome de um país que ganhou o Cup do mundo.

trans-unit.source: It creates a public rule named `WorldCupWinner`.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria uma regra pública denominada `WorldCupWinner`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objects that contain arrays of new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, cria dois <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objetos usando <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objetos que contêm as matrizes de novos <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: To see the grammar that this example generates, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para ver a gramática que gera este exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Any element in the <paramref name="items" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer elemento na matriz <paramref name="items" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The alternative items to add.
trans-unit.target: Os itens alternativos a serem adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> class from an array of <see cref="T:System.String" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> de uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática que reconhece a frase "é de um país que ganhou o Cup World" seguido do nome de um país que ganhou o Cup do mundo.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> element to build lists of acceptable country names from an array of <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> elemento para criar listas de nomes de país aceitável de uma matriz de <xref:System.String> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds one of the resulting <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objects to their respective rules for European countries and South American countries.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona um dos resultante <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objetos seus respectivos regras para países europeus e América do Sul países.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Any element in the <paramref name="items" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer elemento na matriz <paramref name="items" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the list of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: O item a ser adicionado à lista de alternativas.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem" /> containing a word or a phrase to the list of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem" /> que contém uma palavra ou frase para a lista de alternativas.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática que reconhece a frase "é de um país que ganhou o Cup World" seguido do nome de um país que ganhou o Cup do mundo.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object to build lists of acceptable country names from an array of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto para criar listas de nomes de país aceitável de uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Add%2A> method, the example appends an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that contains the string "Italy" to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object `oneOfEurope`.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Add%2A> método, o exemplo anexa um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> que contém a cadeia de caracteres "Itália" para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto `oneOfEurope`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de alternativas contidas no elemento <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a lista de alternativas.

trans-unit.source: The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> or <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Alternativas palavras e frases retornados por essa propriedade podem ter sido adicionados para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> ou <xref:System.String> objetos.
